manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: MEANINGFUL PLAY IS THE KEY TO LEARNING Our Galaxy Slime Kit is the perfect combination of fun and learning. Slime making has been proven to aid a child's development and greatly enhance creativity and our Galaxy Slime Kit does just that! Inside our Galaxy Slime Kit, you'll find a helpful guide with fun and proven recipes on how to make amazing 'out of this world' slimes! Go crazy with inks to make galactic colors, add some Glow In The Dark powder and stars to see your slime glow at night! Add galactic stars to your green slime or glitter flakes to your crazy space colored slime - pop them into the Star and Planet cases to keep squishy and hang in your bedroom at night! Make over 100 different Galaxy Slime combinations. Curious about how many variations of squishy slimes can be made? We know one thing for sure, you're going to have a ton of fun finding out!

SLIME IS MORE THAN FUN AND PLAY! STRENGTHEN PARENT-CHILD RELATIONSHIP Looking for bonding time with your child? Slime making will help strengthen your connection while opening the gateway to fun & healthy conversations. MINIMIZE KIDS SCREEN TIME Slime making encourages kids to explore while enhancing their creativity and problem-solving skills without the use of technology. IMPROVE SOCIAL SKILLS Slime time can help them develop teamwork, build friendships, and boost self-confidence.

Why is Our Slime Sublime? Clearly written instructions for the perfect Slime The BEST slime kit complete set with base Slime, Texture & Storage 100% Hypoallergenic, safe for kids and adults Over 100 combinations of slime fun! WHAT'S IN THE BOX? Jam-packed with everything a slime lover needs for endless Galaxy creations! Activator and Clear GlueMixing Pots & Tools3 x ink colorsBlack Foam Balls3 x Glitter FlakesStar shaped glitterGlow in the Dark PowderGlow in the Dark Stickers and StarsStar & Planet Slime cases with black ribbon

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Daughter loves to make slime
reviews.reviewText: My 5 year old and I sit and make slime together. This kit makes things so easy and has all you need in it to make plenty of slime to keep the kiddos occupied and entertained. Not going to lie, I have enjoyed spending time with her while we make and play with this slime.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My kids 9 & 12 played with this slime kit for hours, with mom joining. Perfect for all ages!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Made a great gift and has some cool pieces in it. Happy with my purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A lot of fun
reviews.reviewText: When it arrived, of course my kiddo instantly wanted to dive in. I was shocked at how much fun it was to make the slides! As long as you follow the directions, its not messy at all. Very enjoyable to do with your little ones and my kid is 7, and had a lot of fun!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We just received the package yesterday and we opened it today, everything is great! Amazing colors and quality, only thing the measuring cup was broken..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun product and excellent customer service
reviews.reviewText: My granddaughter who is 9 yrs old is obsessed with slime. She loved the glow in the dark slime. I also ran into a problem with one of the components. I emailed the seller and in no time he responded with a solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was purchased as a gift for a teen who is obsessed with slime. Overall they were very excited and said that it came with lots of different pieces and they loved it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My granddaughter n I used this n make slime. We had so much fun. Mine was messed a few days later so I called her and ask how to fix n she loved she could help grandma. It’s fixed and I love it.

Trae todo lo que se indica y en gran cantidad, a mi hijo le ha encantado. Se ha liado a mezclar y mezclar como un loco que al final en poco tiempo se quedo sin slime para mezclar del que traía y aun nos queda bastante bolitas,papeles y demás para mezclar, juguete muy completo y recomendable si le encanta el slime.
Je l'ai pris pour ma fille de 10 ans et c'est top, les couleurs rendent bien et le kit est assez conséquent. Le côté galaxie est magnifique je recommande

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 11, 2024

reviews.reviewText: Haben das Set als Geburtstagsgeschenk gekauft, da unsere Tochter zur Zeit gerne mit Schleim spielt und, dank der zahlreichen YouTube Videos dazu, endlich selbst Schleim herstellen wollte. Das Set ist ziemlich umfangreich und hat auch ein tolles Booklet als Beigabe. Ist wirklich toll aufgemacht. Darin wird die Herstellung beschrieben und zum selbst experimentieren angeregt. Wie schon in einer Rezession davor erwähnt: etwas mehr Aktivator als angegeben schadet nicht. Da ist sie aber von selbst ziemlich schnell drauf gekommen. Was sie allerdings ein klein wenig schade gefunden hat, war, dass für leuchtenden Schleim nur eine geringe Menge an Mittel enthalten ist - dafür aber um so mehr der anderen Dinge, für weitere Kreationen. 300ml Kleber sind dabei - für einen Durchgang benötigt man 30ml...da geht also schon was. Auch der Verkäufer sendet einem ein Mail um nachzufragen, ob man zufrieden ist, mit dem, was man bekommen hat - finde ich persönlich ebenfalls toll. Daumen hoch

Con mia figlia avevamo provato in tutti i modi a fare uno slime ma nulla. Ho preso questo kit per una festicciola con le amiche ed è stato un successo!!!! Slime riuscito benissimo e tanti articoli da aggiungere, stelline, brillantini ecc
